trans-unit.source: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: PHP on Windows to SQL DB | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.
trans-unit.target: Presents a sample PHP program that connects to Azure SQL Database from a Windows client, and provides links to the necessary software components needed by the client.

trans-unit.source: Connect to SQL Database by using PHP on Windows
trans-unit.target: Connect to SQL Database by using PHP on Windows

trans-unit.source: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.
trans-unit.target: This topic illustrates how you can connect to Azure SQL Database from a client application written in PHP that runs on Windows.

trans-unit.source: Create a database and retrieve your connection string
trans-unit.target: Create a database and retrieve your connection string

trans-unit.source: See the <link><linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title></link> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.
trans-unit.target: See the <link><linkText>Getting Started Topic</linkText><title></title></link> to learn how to create a sample database and retrieve your connection string.

trans-unit.source: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.
trans-unit.target: It is important you follow the guide to create an AdventureWorks database template.

trans-unit.source: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.
trans-unit.target: The samples shown below only work with the AdventureWorks schema.

trans-unit.source: Connect to your SQL Database database
trans-unit.target: Connect to your SQL Database database

trans-unit.source: This OpenConnection function is called near the top in all of the functions that follow.
trans-unit.target: This OpenConnection function is called near the top in all of the functions that follow.

trans-unit.source: Execute a query and retrieve the result set
trans-unit.target: Execute a query and retrieve the result set

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>sqlsrv_query()</linkText><title></title></link> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>sqlsrv_query()</linkText><title></title></link> function can be used to retrieve a result set from a query against SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of <link><linkText>sqlsrv_fetch_array()</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: This function essentially accepts any query and the connection object and returns a result set which can be iterated over with the use of <link><linkText>sqlsrv_fetch_array()</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Insert a row, pass parameters, and retrieve the generated primary key
trans-unit.target: Insert a row, pass parameters, and retrieve the generated primary key

trans-unit.source: In SQL Database the <link><linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title></link> property and the <link><linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title></link> object can be used to auto-generate <link><linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title></link> values.
trans-unit.target: In SQL Database the <link><linkText>IDENTITY</linkText><title></title></link> property and the <link><linkText>SEQUENCE</linkText><title></title></link> object can be used to auto-generate <link><linkText>primary key</linkText><title></title></link> values.

trans-unit.source: Transactions
trans-unit.target: Transactions

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:
trans-unit.target: This code example demonstrates the use of transactions in which you:

trans-unit.source: -Begin a transaction
trans-unit.target: -Begin a transaction

trans-unit.source: -Insert a row of data, Update another row of data
trans-unit.target: -Insert a row of data, Update another row of data

trans-unit.source: -Commit your transaction if the insert and update were successful and rollback the transaction if one of them was not
trans-unit.target: -Commit your transaction if the insert and update were successful and rollback the transaction if one of them was not

trans-unit.source: Further reading
trans-unit.target: Further reading

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see <link><linkText>Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information regarding PHP installation and usage, see <link><linkText>Accessing SQL Server Databases with PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.
